item.title: TV antennas and Super Bowl rehearsals: How prediction market traders seek an edge

item.title: 'Fresh Air' staff bids farewell to longtime executive producer Danny Miller
item.description: Miller joined Fresh Air as an intern in 1978 and retired at the end of 2025. He led the show through many changes, like going national and editing digitally.

item.title: U.S. unexpectedly adds 130,000 jobs in January after a weak 2025
item.description: U.S. employers added 130,000 jobs in January as the unemployment rate dipped to 4.3% from 4.4% in December. Annual revisions show that job growth last year was far weaker than initially reported.
